page.title: 02RATLINGHOPE MANOR
page.content: {Ratlinghope Manor}is made of white painted rendered stone and brick.The old part is 16th century.It is longer and lower than the part dated 1761.The roof is slate. { On the ground floor}there is a dining room,lounge,hall, workshop, cloakroom, kitchen,and a utility room. { On the first floor}there are four bedrooms,two bathrooms,and a lounge. There is oil central heating and two open fires and a range in the kitchen. They are planning to build a garage soon. {The building is listed grade 2. The house has iron railings around a strip of grass that separates it from the road.The main garden is at the back.There is a patio,flower beds, and the rest is mainly lawn on two levels.
